titleStmt.title: A copie of a certaine letter written by a person of reputation, to a prelate of brabant, being at Brussels. The 25. of Februarie. 1599

publicationStmt.publisher: By [E. Allde for] Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop in Popes-head Alley neere to the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "Regarding Philip III's gift of the Spanish Netherlands and Brabant to Archduke Albert and Princess Isabella."--STC.
A translation form the original Dutch.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes-head Alley neere to the Exchange
